body.name: RoC Multi Correxion 5 in 1 Anti-Aging Daily Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 & Shea Butter, Skin Care Routine, 1.7 Ounces (Packaging May Vary)
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: MULTI-ACTION FACE CREAM: A daily anti-aging moisturizer powered by RoC's Hexyl-R Complex, to fight 5 signs of aging including puffiness, dark circles & wrinkles, and help skin look more youthful & radiant. Broad Spectrum SPF 30 helps protect skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays. Gentle enough for daily use by men and women.

PROVEN RESULTS FOR WOMEN & MEN: A clinically proven formula with glycerin to help visibly improve discolorations, firm the look of skin, reduce dullness & visibly restore skin's radiance in 4 weeks. Dry skin is instantly hydrated. Non-greasy. Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested
ANTI-AGING FORMULAS: Whether you're looking for a solution for deep wrinkles, fine lines, dark circles, crow's feet, uneven skin tone or dry skin, we have an anti-aging formula that's right for you

SCIENCE & BEAUTY: We produce a wide array of skin care products & treatments including daily moisturizers with SPF, hyaluronic and niacinamide acids, facial cleansers, vitamin C serums, retinol skin tone & wrinkle regimens & creams for under eyes, neck firming, decollete & much more.

SKIN CARE INNOVATION: Our products are recognized by beauty industry leaders & dermatologists for their best-in-class effectiveness. We continue to research & innovate new formulas for healthier skin.
body.description: SKIN CARE INNOVATION: Our products are recognized by beauty industry leaders & dermatologists for their best-in-class effectiveness. We continue to research & innovate new formulas for healthier skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Hexyl-R Difference Hexyl-R Complex technology targets skin differently than many other anti-aging ingredientsIt is a naturally occurring lipid 4X more effective than a leading ingredient in visibly improving skin tone & evening the look of age spotsIt helps visibly improve skin tone and has antioxidants & astringent propertiesThis multi functioning ingredient delivers a more even toned complexion & defends against visible signs of aging (i.e, fine lines and wrinkles) for improved skin quality RoC Multi Correxion 5 in 1 Day Cream with SPF 30 See 5 age-defying benefits, hydrate, and protect from harmful UVA/UVB rays. Fight 5 signs of aging in one step and help your skin look more youthful and radiant in only 4 weeks. Powered by Hexyl-R Complex to reduce the appearance of discoloration, density loss, dryness, dull tone and wrinkles. Skin is hydrated and healthy-looking with discolorations visibly improved for a more even tone. Broad Spectrum SPF 30 helps protect against harmful UVA/UVB rays. Gentle enough for daily use. CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS IN 4 WEEKS: Discolorations are visibly improved* Skin appears firmer* Dullness is reduced, restoring the look of radiance to skin* Fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced* *Results based on clinical study, data on file

Vitamin C Cleanser Multi Correxion 5 in 1 Eye Cream Revive + Glow Vitamin C Daily Serum Multi Correxion 5 in 1 SPF 30 Day Cream Multi Correxion 5 in 1 Night Cream YOUR RECOMMENDED RoC REGIMEN CLEANSE without stripping skin of its natural moisture TARGET 5 main eye concerns with this multitasker to help the eye area look brighter, smoother and rejuvenated TREAT fatigued skin to maximize luminosity & reveal a visibly tighter, brighter and more even complexion MOISTURIZE + PROTECT with a multi-benefit anti-aging day cream with SPF MOISTURIZE + REJUVENATE while you sleep with a multi-benefit night cream AGE-DEFYING BENEFITS See an instant glow, dissolve dirt and oils, and leave skin smooth and refreshed after a single use Visibly reduce the look of discoloration, density loss, dryness, dull tone & wrinkles around the delicate eye area Visibly improve skin elasticity, texture and luminosity and the look of fine lines & wrinkles Hydrate, reduce the appearance of discoloration, density loss, dryness, dull tone and wrinkles + help protect against sun damage with broad spectrum SPF30 Enhance night-time renewal, reduce the appearance of discoloration, density loss, dryness, dull tone and wrinkles. WHEN TO USE AM & PM, as first step in skincare regimen AM and PM, to treat the skin around the delicate Eye Area AM & PM after cleansing and before moisturizing AM as last step in skincare regimen PM as last step in skincare regimen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent moisturizer and sun screen in one.
reviews.reviewText: After a week it really does minimize the fine wrinkles. I have used ROC for years. I just turned 87 and I get compliments on my complexion all the time. This product use to come in a tube.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never disappointed with ROC skincare products. They are expensive, but they are gentle on the skin and are go-to products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells good not to strong
reviews.reviewText: Love the fragance it has and makes my skin feel really good, not drying or chalking since it has SPF was scared of that being the case, I’ll continue to use it, I was using a different face cream before and was expecting to breakout from it when I started using it but it didn’t happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: im really a loreal product person, its my first time to try this product and its good, i like the light scent of it,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I noticed small changes in my skin right away.
reviews.reviewText: I love this face lotion.It goes on really nice..even my make up went on smoother.Feels hydrating but not greasy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My primary mosturizer
reviews.reviewText: All good feedback. Love this moisturizer. Have been using for about a month & the texture of my skin has improved significantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I use this in combination with another moisturizer, put this on top to go right under my foundation and it helps it go on smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It didn’t do anything for age slots
reviews.reviewText: Like the consistency of cream nice applicator I liked the fragrance

reviews.reviewerName: Muy poca seriedad en mandar el productor tengo más de un mes y no me lo manda

reviews.reviewTitle: Calidad perfecta a un buen precio
reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien,deja mi piel lisa con un tono muy bonito,no es grasienta y me proteje bastante bien del sol.La repetiré sin duda!
It’s a bit oily but it smells good love it as a moisturiser which comes with sunblock
Buena presentación y calidad de la marca es excelente
